Import / Export Overview

The Import and Export options can be reached from the File Menu, the White-Space Right-Click Menu and the Node Right-Click Menu.

 

  • Import XML - how to import Compendium views in XML format.
  • Import Flashmeeting XML - how to import FlashMeeting data in XML format.
  • Import from Questmap - how to import a Questmap view.
  • Import Image Folder into Current Map - how to import a folder of images as reference nodes.
  • Export as XML - how to export nodes and views to XML.
  • Export as Web Outline - how to export a view to a Web Outline.
  • Export as Web Maps - how to export a view to Web Maps.
  • Power Export - how to export a view to a zip containing Web Maps, Outline View and Compendium XML zip.
